argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tsettps.a | |- A = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | tsettps.j | |- J = ( TopSet ` K ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_topontopn | |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` A ) -> J = ( TopOpen ` K ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_id | |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` A ) -> J e. ( TopOn ` A ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` A ) -> ( TopOpen ` K ) e. ( TopOn ` A ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( TopOpen ` K ) = ( TopOpen ` K ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_istps | |- ( K e. TopSp <-> ( TopOpen ` K ) e. ( TopOn ` A ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_sylibr | |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` A ) -> K e. TopSp ) |
